title: What Strategist Readers Are Buying: A Whole Lot of Moisturizer
text:
8. Wamsutta Extra-Firm Side-Sleeper Pillow (9)

If you’re thinking it’s time to replace your pillow, this long-time favorite of ours (it’s made the best-seller list 21 times now) would be a solid replacement pick. We discovered it when we tested out a wide selection of pillows designed for side sleepers, and concluded that the Wamsutta Extra-Firm was the most comfortable and supportive of them all: “Unlike other pillows that mistake plushness or fluffiness for support, the WEF didn’t sink as soon as I rested my head. Instead, it had a firm, satisfying spring — it’s a different sensation, but one I took to right away. And even though I didn’t do any measuring, my head felt more propped up from the mattress and sheets than with any other pillow.”
description: This week, Strategist readers bought moisturizers from CeraVe, Curél, and Neutrogena; Wamsutta pillows, Real Purity natural deodorant, RoC retinol wrinkle cream, Maelove vitamin C serum, Oral-B toothbrushes, and British M Organics hair oil.
